item.title: golang air 热更新使用
item.description: 首先安装 air 运行命令：go install github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest 项目根目录创建 air 配置文件：.air.conf mac 系统文件内容 1# .air.conf 文件内容 2root = "." 3tmp_dir = "tmp" 4 5[build] 6# Just plain old shell command. You could use `make` as well. 7cmd = "go build -o ./tmp/main ./web/main.go" 8# Binary file yields from `cmd`. 9bin = "tmp/main" 10# Customize binary. 11full_bin = "APP_ENV=dev APP_USER=air ./tmp/main" 12# Watch these filename extensions. 13include_ext = ["go", "tpl", "tmpl", "html"] 14# Ignore these filename extensions or directories.
